participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

content.text: hi, how many bunnies have you rescued recently?
hi, I'm 100. I have a age. how about you?
I'm not that old. I donate some of my earnings to the local nursery home. hope you're not in need
I hope so. I am very strong. I remember how to live forever
I'm strong too. I work in a shipyard. Ironically my favourite color is navy blue
I like blue too. I am a very strong age. how old are you?
I'm in my fifties. but I feel younger.
I am sorry to hear that. do you have any hobbies? I like to remember
I'm too busy experiencing new stuff to spend time reminiscing
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you like to travel? I do
I like traveling, but I feel my money can be spent better
I hope you do not feel like you are a strong person. do you live forever?
